data.name: CrewmateFullDescription
data.value: Complete your task and exile all IMPOSTORS!

data.name: EngineerFullDescription
data.value: A CREWMATE who can use the vents

data.name: ScientistFullDescription
data.value: A CREWMATE with a mobile VITALS monitor. Charge your batteries by time or complete tasks to access your mobile vitals monitor.

data.name: SpecialCrewFullDescription
data.value: A CREWMATE role which can be modified with Extreme roles' common settings (i.e. vision) Check the settings below:

data.name: SheriffSyncShootTaskGage
data.value: Amplifier of tasks to reload a bullet

data.name: SheriffIntroDescription
data.value: SHOOT your foes for the sake of the crew

data.name: SheriffFullDescription
data.value: A CREWMATE role with a KILL button with limited bullets. The KILL may backfire and KILL you when: - If you shoot at a CREWMATE role - If you shoot at the Assasin while "Can KILL the Assasin" is OFF If "Enable task-related settings" is ON, you have no bullets initially (with no KILL button), and you get another bullet when you complete a task (up to the number of "Maximum bullets to shoot").

data.name: MaintainerFullDescription
data.value: A crewamte role with an ability to repair sabotages. "REPAIR" : Immediately repairs current sabotage and opens all doors throughout the map.

data.name: NeetShortDescription
data.value: Enjoy your stay in the ship!

data.name: NeetFullDescription
data.value: A CREWMATE role who can do literally nothing. Maybe you can waste your time chasing others?

data.name: NeetNeutralFullDescription
data.value: A NEUTRAL role which can do literally nothing. MISSION : SURVIVE until the game ends Maybe you can waste your time chasing others?

data.name: WatchdogIntroDescription
data.value: Track them down and find out your foes

data.name: WatchdogShortDescription
data.value: Access cameras and logs to track them all

data.name: WatchdogFullDescription
data.value: A CREWMATE role which has access to portable security cameras and door logs. Accessible to the Door logs for Mira HQ, and security cameras for other maps Uses battery charge while opening; You can recharge it by waiting the cooldown or completing tasks.

data.name: SupervisorShortDescription
data.value: Monitor their positions and find out your foes

data.name: SupervisorFullDescription
data.value: A CREWMATE role with a mobile "ADMIN". Uses battery charge while opening; You can recharge it by waiting the cooldown or completing tasks. If ""ADMIN" : Does enhance with task completion" is true, you can access the ADMIN with colored CREWMATE icons after some task completion. The normal ADMIN is not enhanced; it only effects the ADMIN opened by your ability.

data.name: BodyGuardFeatMeetingAbilityTaskGage
data.value: "GUARD" : Task completion rate to use in meetings

data.name: BodyGuardIsReportPlayerName
data.value: "GUARD" : Does show player name(s) on martydom report

data.name: BodyGuardIsBlockMeetingKill
data.value: "GUARD" : Can guard KILLs occuring in meetings

data.name: BodyGuardIntroDescription
data.value: GUARD your mates with your body

data.name: BodyGuardShortDescription
data.value: You are the GUARD of your mates

data.name: BodyGuardFullDescription
data.value: A CREWMATE role which can guard other CREWMATEs by setting "GUARD"s. When a player with a "GUARD" active is targeted by a Kill, YOU will be Killed and the player will be alive. The "GUARD"s will be reset when "RESET GUARD" is used, or the Bodyguard is Killed. When they complete tasks more than " "GUARD": Death alert task completion rate" rate, their death by "GUARD" will be alerted in the beginning of the next meeting.

data.name: meetingShieldState
data.value: You can guard {0} times during this meeting

data.name: WhisperIntroDescription
data.value: Your ear is to hear the screams

data.name: WhisperFullDescription
data.value: A CREWMATE role with the ability "LISTEN". "LISTEN" : Can knnow every death of players by idling. - Can be triggered by idling for a set amount of time - Can only be used during idiling; cancells ability on movement - Can know "When" and "Which direction" the death occured - You can know "Which room" the death occured after a set rate of task completion, if the corresponding option is on.

data.name: killedTextWithRoom
data.value: You heard a death from {1}, in {0} ({2}).

data.name: killedText
data.value: You heard a death from somewhere {0} ({1}).

data.name: TimeMasterShortDescription
data.value: The TIME winds only for you

data.name: TimeMasterFullDescription
data.value: A CREWMATE role with the ability "SHIELD". When you are targeted by KILL while "SHIELD" is active, the time rewinds and all other CREWMATEs will go back in time. You will able to move freely during the rewind. Only movements of CREWMATEs will be rewinded, and the seconds can be changed by the "Seconds rewinded by "SHIELD"" setting.

data.name: AgencyShortDescription
data.value: TAKE OVER their tasks and help them complete

data.name: AgencyFullDescription
data.value: A CREWMATE role which can take over other's tasks. "TAKE OVER" : Reduces targeted player's task and adds a same amount of tasks to you. - Does not add "same tasks", but adds "tasks in same categories", such as "Short" "Long" "Common". - Used on crewmates with tasks: 1 ~ number set by ""TAKE OVER" : Max tasks taking" tasks will taken. - Used on player with no tasks: Your tasks increases by a set number referring to the total task completion rate in-game. Maybe you can use it as a task-checker? - Used on player with all tasks completed: Does nothing.

data.name: BakaryIntroDescription
data.value: A yummy bread for your mates!

data.name: BakaryShortDescription
data.value: Bake a bread and serve for them!

data.name: BakaryFullDescription
data.value: A CREWMATE role with the ability to show a message after every meeting. A message appears for you until you are DEAD, even if your ROLE changes to something else. The message changes with the elasped time between meetings : - Shorter than "Bread bakes in" : underdone - Between "Bread bakes in" and "Bread burns in" : Well done - Longer than "Bread burns in" : Burnt

data.name: rawBread
data.value: The BAKER wasn't ready to serve breads

data.name: badBread
data.value: The BAKER forgot to put the bread out of the oven

data.name: CurseMakerTaskCurseTimeReduceRate
data.value: Reduction rate of ability duration on task completion

data.name: CurseMakerNotRemoveDeadBodyTaskGage
data.value: Task completion rate of non-consuming corpse

data.name: CurseMakerIsMultiDeadBodySearch
data.value: Does show multiple arrows to corpse

data.name: CurseMakerSearchDeadBodyTime
data.value: Seconds from death of corpse for arrows to be enabled

data.name: CurseMakerIsReduceSearchForTask
data.value: Does task completion fasten arrow appearance

data.name: CurseMakerShortDescription
data.value: CURSE your foes in revenge of your mates

data.name: CurseMakerFullDescription
data.value: A CREWMATE role with the ability to CURSE the killer, consuming a dead body. By using CURSE to a corpse, you can give an adittional cooldown to the killer's Kill Cooldown, and also resets it. The corpse may be consumed and will disappear referring to settings. The additional cooldown effect is permanent, and will not be cleared on emergency meetings. When "Does show arrows to corpse" is TRUE, an arrow pointing the corpse will show up after a few seconds, which is set by the "Seconds from death of corpse for arrows to be enabled" setting.

data.name: FencerIntroDescription
data.value: Nah, I won't be KILLed so easily

data.name: FencerFullDescription
data.value: A CREWMATE role with the ability to "COUNTER" KILLs from your enemies. When you were targeted by a KILL during the ability "COUNTER", the KILL will be canceled and you will be able to use KILL, with no cooldown. KILL will disappear after a set duration, which is set by ""COUNTER" : Temporary KILL duration" option. During "COUNTER", you will be invincive from all KILLs (Does not nullify non-KILL ability deaths such as MISSIONARY's propagation).

data.name: OpenerShortDescription
data.value: Open the doors and your way to glory

data.name: OpenerFullDescription
data.value: A CREWMATE role with the ability to "OPEN" doors. By using "OPEN", a nearby door will be immediately opened. By completing tasks, the ability stock will added by an amount and also the cooldown will given a reduction, referring to the settings.

data.name: CarpenterAwakeTaskGage
data.value: Task completion rate to reveal role

data.name: CarpenterIntroDescription
data.value: It's my duty to keep this ship safe!

data.name: CarpenterShortDescription
data.value: Set CAMERAs and SEAL vents for safety

data.name: CarpenterFullDescription
data.value: A CREWMATE role with the ability to set CAMERAs and seal VENTs. The ability icon changes to "SEAL" when a open VENT is nearby. Does consume a set amount of SCREWS to set CAMERAs or seal VENTs. "CAMERA" : Sets a security camera on player position, which is accessible from the security monitor "SEAL" : Seals vent and disables player access. Does not nullify the VENT-Cleaning task (Can be done as usual).

data.name: SurvivorAwakeTaskGage
data.value: Task completion rate to reveal role

data.name: SurvivorDeadWinTaskGage
data.value: Task percentage to achive for victory before death

data.name: SurvivorNoWinSurvivorAssignGhostRole
data.value: Does assign GHOST ROLE when the SURVIVOR cannot win

data.name: SurvivorIntroDescription
data.value: I just want to live a little more

data.name: SurvivorFullDescription
data.value: A CREWMATE role who needs to survive to win. You need to achive a given percentage of task completion before you die, unless you can't win with the other CREWMATEs! If you die before you achive it, your task will not be count for the CREWMATE's task victory requirements. If you achive it before you die, hooray! You can join the CREWMATE victory with your mates.

data.name: CaptainAwakeTaskGage
data.value: Task completion rate to reveal role

data.name: CaptainChargeVoteWhenSkip
data.value: "SP. VOTE" : Votes charged per skip or non-vote

data.name: CaptainIntroDescription
data.value: I'm the Cap of the ship!!

data.name: CaptainShortDescription
data.value: Use more votes to exile those foes

data.name: CaptainFullDescription
data.value: A CREWMATE role with the ability vote multiple times during the meeting. "SPECIAL VOTE" : On usage, adds multiple votes as a player vote on meetings. - Can be used when you have more than 1 votes stocked. Stocked votes can be charged by skips or non-votes (Does also count during the role is not revealed). - Will show an icon on the player nameplate when used. Can switch targeted player by using the ability once more. - On ability usage, consumes all stocked votes and resets its charge.

data.name: PhotographerAwakeTaskGage
data.value: Task completion rate to reveal role

data.name: PhotographerUpgradePhotoTaskGage
data.value: "CAPTURE" : Task completion percentage for ability buff

data.name: PhotographerEnableAllSendChat
data.value: "CAPTURE" : Does captured info shared with everyone

data.name: PhotographerUpgradeAllSendChatTaskGage
data.value: Task completion rate to share info

data.name: PhotographerFullDescription
data.value: A CREWMATE role with the ability to "CAPTURE" photographs. "CAPTURE" : Can capture a "photograph" which contains who was near the photographer. - The "photo" includes the positions of players who were within the ability range, which can be seen on chat when the next meeting starts - The information shown on chat becomes more detailed with task completion - The title of the photograph is completely random; does not have any hints!

data.name: onlyMeOnPhoto
data.value: There was only myself in the frame…

data.name: DelusionerIsOnetimeAwake
data.value: Does need to match revealing means every meeting

data.name: DelusionerIsIncludeLocalPlayer
data.value: "DEFLECT" : Does include yourself as a teleport targeted position

data.name: DelusionerIsIncludeSpawnPoint
data.value: "DEFLECT" : Does include map's initial spawn point as a teleport targeted position

data.name: DelusionerIntroDescription
data.value: STAY THE HECK AWAY FROM ME!!

data.name: ResurrecterAwakeTaskGage
data.value: Task completion rate to reveal role

data.name: ResurrecterResurrectTaskGage
data.value: Task completion rate to gain auto resurrection

data.name: ResurrecterIsMeetingCoolResetOnResurrect
data.value: Does reset emergency meeting cooldown on player ressurection

data.name: ResurrecterResurrectDelayTime
data.value: Seconds from death to ressurect player

data.name: ResurrecterResurrectTaskResetMeetingNum
data.value: Meetings for ressurected player's task to be rewinded

data.name: ResurrecterResurrectTaskResetGage
data.value: Task rewinding rate of ressurection penalty

data.name: ResurrecterCanResurrectAfterDeath
data.value: Can ressurect after achieving means after death

data.name: ResurrecterFullDescription
data.value: A CREWMATE role with the ability to ressurect once. By reaching a set amount of tasks, you can gain the ability to ressurect. - When Killed after reaching means, the player will be ressurected after a set timer. The player cannot see other players' role while being "temporary-dead". - When the corresponding option is ON, immediately ressurect player by reaching means after death. - On ressurection, the player will be teleported to the (random) spawn point. A blue flash will be shown to the Killer's window. - After a set amount of emergency meetings, the Ressurecter's task will be rewinded as a penalty. The Ressurecter will not be assigned to a ghost role.

data.name: GamblerIntroDescription
data.value: Role the dice to vote twice!

data.name: TeleporterCanUseOtherPlayer
data.value: "PORTAL" : Can other players use the portal

data.name: TeleporterFullDescription
data.value: A CREWMATE role with the ability to open teleportation Portals. "PORTAL" : A simple teleportation portal! - Can charge the ability by gathering FRAGS scattered across the map - One ability charge can open one Portal (two Portal gates) - A player can use a Portal once in 5 seconds - The corresponding option must be on to enable other players besides the Teleporter to access the Portal.

data.name: ModeratorAwakeTaskGage
data.value: Task completion rate to reveal role

data.name: ModeratorShortDescription
data.value: Extend meetings and exile your foes

data.name: ModeratorFullDescription
data.value: A CREWMATE role with the ability to extend the next meeting once in a game. "MODERATE" : Shall we talk a little more longer? - Extends the next meetng's timer by a set amount

data.name: PsychicAwakeTaskGage
data.value: Task completion rate to reveal role

data.name: PsychicIsUpgradeAbility
data.value: "CALL" : Does ability gain buffs in game

data.name: PsychicIntroDescription
data.value: Hear the whispers of the dead…

data.name: PsychicShortDescription
data.value: CALL to the dead and gain information

data.name: PsychicFullDescription
data.value:
A CREWMATE role with the ability to gain information from the dead.
"CALL" : I hear whispers from the dead… - Gains informatrion by standing still and waiting for a set duration. - Informations of other teams' remaining players will be shown on the chat in the next meeting. This excluedes CREWMATES (even if you have been changed teams i.e. Servants). - May be buffed by task completion and player eliminations when the corresponding options are on

data.name: PsychicPsychicEnd
data.value: Successfully gained information. Must show them on the next meeting…

data.name: TrackerFullDescription
data.value: A CREWMATE who can always see the location of one crewmate on the map.

data.name: NoisemakerFullDescription
data.value: A CREWMATE who, when killed, can notify everyone of their location for a certain period of time.

data.name: DelusionerFullDescription
data.value: A CREWMATE role that can teleport players with "DEFLECT". Button ability "DEFLECT": - Can be activated by targeting a nearby player. - Teleports that player to a random player's location (including the Delusioner). - If the option ""DEFLECT": Does include map's initial spawn point as a teleport targeted position" is ON, the map's spawn points are also included as teleport destinations in addition to player locations. - If the option ""DEFLECT": Does enable misfire" is ON and the cooldown is over and there are ability charges remaining, if the Delusioner is about to be killed, the ability will misfire and teleport players within range for the number of remaining charges. If the option "Does need to match revealing means every meeting" is ON, if the awakening condition is not met in the next meeting after awakening, the Delusioner will return to the unawakened state.

data.name: JailerAwakeTaskGage
data.value: Task completion rate to awaken as Jailer (Awakening Condition: 1)

data.name: JailerAwakeDeadPlayerNum
data.value: Number of dead players to awaken as Jailer (Awakening Condition: 2)

data.name: JailerIsDeadAbilityZero
data.value: "IMPRISON" : Suicide if succeeds and charges become 0

data.name: JailerHasOtherKillRange
data.value: Does Lawbreaker have different kill range

data.name: JailerFullDescription
data.value: A CREWMATE role that can convert a specific non-Crewmate player to the Crewmate team. Button ability "IMPRISON": - Can be activated by targeting a nearby player. - If that player is of the "Team that "IMPRISON" succeeds on", that player is changed to a "Yardbird" on the Crewmate team. - If the option "Does "IMPRISON" failure lead to suicide" is OFF, on failure, the Jailer themself is changed to a "Lawbreaker", a Neutral role whose goal is the Crewmate team's defeat.

data.name: YardbirdShortDescription
data.value: Atone for past misdeeds and rehabilitate

data.name: YardbirdFullDescription
data.value: A CREWMATE role created by the "Jailer". May have more tasks, slower walking speed, or be unable to use some map equipment depending on settings. Otherwise, inherits basic Crewmate settings.

data.name: LawbreakerShortDescription
data.value: Eliminate the crew before your mistake is discovered

data.name: LawbreakerFullDescription
data.value: A role born as a result of the "Jailer's" "IMPRISON" failure. Victory Condition: "Crewmates lose" * When a non-Crewmate team wins, you win alongside them. Inherits the Jailer's settings at the time of change, except for kill, sabotage, and vent settings.

data.name: SummonerIntroDescription
data.value: Make a contract and become my familiar!!

data.name: SummonerFullDescription
data.value: A CREWMATE role that teleports a "MARKED" player to their location. Button abilities can be switched using the mouse scroll wheel. Button ability "MARK": - Can be activated by targeting a nearby player. - A "◀" tag is displayed on the name of the "MARKED" person. - If the "MARKED" player enters a meeting dead, the "MARK" is removed. Button ability "SUMMON": - Can be activated when there is a "MARKED" player. - Teleports that player to your coordinates. - If that player is dead, their body is teleported.

data.name: BaitAwakeTaskGage
data.value: Task completion rate to awaken as Bait

data.name: BaitEnableBaitBenefit
data.value: Enable kill cooldown bonus for killers after forced report

data.name: BaitShortDescription
data.value: Use yourself as bait to corner the impostors

data.name: BaitFullDescription
data.value: A CREWMATE role that, when killed, forces a report on themself after a certain period of time. Ability "Forced Report": - When killed, forces a report on their own body after "Delay time until forced report". - If "Enable kill cooldown bonus for killers after forced report" is ON, for a certain period after this role is killed, the cooldown reduction speed of the kill button is increased.
